mean_cn: n. 个人主义，利己主义，个人特征
mean_en: the belief that the needs of each person are more important than the needs of the whole society or group
word_etyma: individual个人的 + ism名词后缀：…主义 → individualism 个人主义
sentence: His strong sense of individualism kept him from joining the rest of the crowd.
sentence_trans: 他强烈的个人主义使他没有加入其他人。
